title: Bug 17703 - Inconsistent Dialog When Adding Task
description: When attempting to add a task using the 'Edit' > 'Add Task' action, the displayed dialog differs from the one obtained by executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
OB: When using the 'Edit' > 'Add Task' action, a different dialog appears compared to the one accessed through the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'Edit' > 'Add Task' action should display the same dialog as when executed from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
1. Open the 'Packages' view.
2. Select a Java compilation unit (CU) using the F1 key.
3. Execute the 'File' > 'Add Task' action.
4. Notice the observed difference in the dialog.
5. Alternatively, access the Java editor, select a CU, right-click on the ruler, and choose 'Add Task' to observe the expected dialog.
